description: Update a driver day trips adjustment
permissions: Requires authorization on the related tender job schedule shift; access is delegated via DriverDayTripsAdjustmentPolicy.
side_effects: Updates fields on the specified driver day trips adjustment record.
validation_notes: At least one updatable field must be provided. If provided, --new-trips-attributes cannot be empty and must be a JSON array. If provided, --status must be a valid status enum value (editing).

flags.name: --status
flags.validation: Must be a valid status enum value (editing).

flags.name: --new-trips-attributes
flags.description: JSON array of updated trip attributes
flags.validation: When provided, must be a non-empty JSON array.
